content:
Hi @Richard Ettema i found some issues in the TestScript FHIR4-0-0-Connectathon20--patient-formal-c20-fhirserver-02-update-server-id-json beacause my server use the cache for reuse searches, maybe it is posible to add this header param cache-control: no-cache to the setup operation in the testscript, maybe the same solution apply to others Test Definitions in Touchstone.

Thanks in advance
